website_summaries.verdict: Works great for both experienced and novice anglers. Good value for high-performance reel.
pros: Extremely durable, as the reel features stainless steel
Works as good as it looks
Offers multiple-use cases for fishing in different locations
cons: Line may start to tangle after several casts

customer_reviews.title: Best panfish and walleye reel
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite reel. I like it better than my shimano symetre reel that is twice the price. Takes a beating and keeps on ticking. I find the 6930 size is perfect for a light to medium light panfish/walleye rod. I pair it with St. Croix premier or avid rods. It even handles pesky northerns that sometime get on the line.
customer_reviews.author: Jon

customer_reviews.title: Very Good Value
customer_reviews.text: I own several of these and find them to work well, both in terms of action and drag. I fish between 75-100 days a year, so my reels get a lot of use (and abuse). Although I have several brands of reels in my collection, I've settled on these Pfluegers as my choice. They're a great value at a moderate price.
customer_reviews.author: Nightrunner

customer_reviews.title: Smooooth
customer_reviews.text: The Pflueger President is the smoothest spinning reel available at this price point. I own 8 of them, some of them 4 years old with heavy use, and they preform very well. I recommend them to anyone who wants a quality reel at a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: Tom C

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful reel that fishes well
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this reel to replace another reel that was damaged while I was saltwater fishing in florida. I was very impressed with how smooth this reel is and fished it for a week with great success. Fishing in saltwater is a real test and only time will tell but so far this reel has done great.
customer_reviews.author: Kplus8

customer_reviews.title: Love these reels
customer_reviews.text: Love these reels, sold all my Shimanos and switched over to these and couldn't be happier. Much smoother than the Shimano's I had and less than half the price, I sold 3 used Shimanos on Ebay for enough to pay for 6 Pflueger Presidents.
customer_reviews.author: Mildot

customer_reviews.title: They are excellent values. This "6920" will be matched to a ...
customer_reviews.text: I have several President reels in multiple sizes. They are excellent values. This "6920" will be matched to a 5'6" St. Croix ultra-lite. It is a very small reel, well suited to the ultra-lite or even ice fishing gear, but if you are going any heavier you'll want to step up to the "6925" or "6930".
customer_reviews.author: Dan O'Connor

customer_reviews.title: Weight with line is 249 grams. (Model 6930 (6-pound/145-yard)) ...
customer_reviews.text: Weight with line is 249 grams. (Model 6930 (6-pound/145-yard)) Photos on the Ugly Stik GX2 spinning 3 piece 5' light, and Ugly Stik Elite 5'6".
customer_reviews.author: Nathaniel Barwell

customer_reviews.title: Great quality at an awesome price
customer_reviews.text: These reels are smooth as glass. You simply can't beat the price you pay for the quality that is put into them. The drag is very smooth and consistent, and the 10 bearings it has give it a silky feel and really nice retrieve. With a $50-$60 price range, you can't go wrong. I use one for a drop shot rig on a 7' rod. It is spooled with braid, and it handles the braid really well, no problems with overlapping or hanging up on the roller bearing. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Larry

customer_reviews.title: Too heavy
customer_reviews.text: Too large and heavy. I was expecting an ultralight, but got a gorilla. Will still stand by Pflueger even though the size 20 doesn't mean you're getting an ultralight.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Newland

customer_reviews.title: Pflueger, what can you say, but Great!
customer_reviews.text: I have several other Pflueger spinning reels, I think I like this one the best because it holds more than enough braided line for use on bass, salmon, walleye, pike, etc. The reel is very smooth on retrieve and has a good reel brake.
customer_reviews.author: R. Marshall

customer_reviews.title: This item was perfect and was exactly what i was expecting
customer_reviews.text: This item was perfect and was exactly what i was expecting. The item came in no time and was very well packaged and in a great shape. I'm very happy and pleased with the item i received and want to thank the seller for a terrific product.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Bruce

customer_reviews.title: You will have a hard time finding a better reel at the price of these. Try one, what have you got to lose for this price?
customer_reviews.text: Great reel for my style fishing. Pan fishing for bluegills, crappie, perch, walleye. Silky smooth casting and retrieve. Solidly built. And just as good if not better than competitive reels costing twice as much if not more. So I bought two. Never hurts to have a spare of something great.
customer_reviews.author: bret chapman

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with size of
customer_reviews.text: Very smooth. First fish caught weighed 30lbs. & reel functioned perfectly. Very happy with size of reel
customer_reviews.author: sparky

customer_reviews.title: Great reel.
customer_reviews.text: This is my 3rd Pflueger, 2nd president. Last reel I bought was a supreme XT, for over double the price it doesn't seem any better than this one. Durable and smooth year after year.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Banach

customer_reviews.title: Great Reel
customer_reviews.text: If this is a low or mid-range Pflueger, I can't imagine what the higher end ones are capable of. Probably more than I'll ever be able to get out of them. Wonderful product.
customer_reviews.author: TheMadOne

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.text: Love it.. first nice reel I have purchased.. couldn't be happier, very smooth, precise .. put it on a St Croix Ultralight rod for Trout .. worked great!

customer_reviews.title: what can you say its a Pflueger it works great, I use it for bass and all freshwater ...
customer_reviews.text: what can you say its a Pflueger it works great, I use it for bass and all freshwater fishing I used it the other day for fluke"in on a 7 foot ugly stik g2 it did great totally love this reel
customer_reviews.author: mikey, d

customer_reviews.title: Poorly designed
customer_reviews.text: Worked good when new. Bail won’t close after casting. Must close bail by hand. Would not purchase again
customer_reviews.author: Wayne D.

customer_reviews.title: ... fishing the bail slips when i cast rendering it useless. i've had other reels from this line and ...
customer_reviews.text: after a summer of light fishing the bail slips when i cast rendering it useless. i've had other reels from this line and haven't have a problem so this might just be a fluke. check other reviews before buying.
customer_reviews.author: toddler1138

customer_reviews.title: Nice Reel
customer_reviews.text: Put this reel on my ultra light rod, real smooth and works like I anticipated. Nice upgrade from what I had.
customer_reviews.author: Bldn

customer_reviews.title: Very smooth
customer_reviews.text: I love this reel, very smooth in casting and reeling back in. Very happy with it plus it looks awesome. First day i used it i caught 15 fish and it made everything that much easier
customer_reviews.author: Justin goyco

customer_reviews.title: I love it. It functions well
customer_reviews.text: It is a very small reel for those that aren't sure of the size. I love it. It functions well. The reel is smooth and the drag seems robust. I have only used it a couple of times and I haven't pushed it very hard yet. Small diameter super lines are probably the way to go due to the small line capacity. I put it on a 5 oz rod, so I am handling less than 12 oz which makes fishing all day a bit easier. For an lightweight spinning reel (ultra-light probably better choice of words) it seems like a great option. I would definitely recommed it.
customer_reviews.author: James A Pounders

customer_reviews.title: Great reel.
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful spinning reel. I've never dealt with any of the reels that cost over $100 but this is definitely one of the best for less than $100. I bought the 35 because it was the cheapest of them at the time and I didn't much care which size I got since I wasn't sure what pole I was going to put it on.
customer_reviews.author: BJ

customer_reviews.title: better than other name brands
customer_reviews.text: best for saltwater in my opinion. last one lasted 4 years with simple care
customer_reviews.author: george gomez

customer_reviews.title: Will last a lifetime
customer_reviews.text: Gest purchased a new one for a second pole.i have used my old one for 5 years now and love it to get a better real you will have to spend over 200 bucks.i fish A LOT and can tell no difference ln the old and new real in functional quality
customer_reviews.author: jason will

customer_reviews.title: Not good choice for salt water use
customer_reviews.text: Review based on saltwater use: Reel very smooth and a pleasure to use. Unfortunately, the salt air will corrode the handle arm and trim pretty quickly. All my Pfluger spinners do this, but I usually still get a couple of years use before replacing. This one corroded very quickly within a few months. And yes, I rinse and keep them lubricated.
customer_reviews.author: George H. Cassidy

customer_reviews.title: High Quality Reel
customer_reviews.text: This really made a great gift to an avid fisherman. Quality reels are the only type the recipient uses, and he loves this reel.
customer_reviews.author: peruser

customer_reviews.title: Nice Reel
customer_reviews.text: Love this reel. It's a little bigger than the 6720 I already own, but it's silky smooth and feels great. I like the rubber handle on reel too, just a subtle change from the wood one on the 6720. Can't get a better reel for the price in my opinion. Only have two spinning reels and both are Pflueger.
customer_reviews.author: D Berry

customer_reviews.title: or sa better process, Anodized handle
customer_reviews.text: The Handle is inferior coating and peals off. The aluminum is corroding and I have five of these. Replacement handles are expensive and they should change Handle material to a Composite,or sa better process, Anodized handle.
customer_reviews.author: Paul E. Rose

customer_reviews.title: My go to setup, perfect for fish under 10lb
customer_reviews.text: Havent had any trouble. Reel is Durable, smooth and sleek. Handles inshore fish just fine, dont excpect it to have stopping power though.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love the stable click as the bail on my last ...
customer_reviews.text: No problems with this reel. Love the stable click as the bail on my last reel would sometimes close during casting. This reel is very affordable and have no no problems fishing rivers to salt water bays.
customer_reviews.author: Jason J

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: one of the best reels for the money i have 2 of these
customer_reviews.author: porky

customer_reviews.title: This is a fantastic reel. High quality construction with thick wire bail ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic reel. High quality construction with thick wire bail unlike some other spinning reels. Have two of these and use them all the time in the summer. Never have issues.
customer_reviews.author: JMcQ

customer_reviews.title: Excellent reel!
customer_reviews.text: A very good real with quality built right in! Will buy again!

customer_reviews.title: Great reel
customer_reviews.text: Great reel. Functions smoothly and has a nice smooth drag.
customer_reviews.author: Duane Wallace

customer_reviews.title: Pflueger President reel
customer_reviews.text: I'm very happy with this reel. Operates smoothly and performs well. I've been using it to catch walleye and northern pike. The northern pike frequently pull drag out with multiple runs and I have yet to have an issue. Good reel.

customer_reviews.title: Best spinning reels out there
customer_reviews.text: Best spinning reels out there. I own 4 of them and they cast a mile and work great. I would recommend them to anyone who wants a quality reel that lasts forever.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice sturdy reel
customer_reviews.text: I paired this 10 bearing reel with a Quantum Response Series Rod to make a nice sturdy bass fishing rig. I used it this past season and I like it as much as my other bass rods.
customer_reviews.author: rrct1

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: A gift for my husband. He said its just the item he wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: Great spinning reel
customer_reviews.text: I have no idea why anybody would pass this spinning reel up and pay twice the price when this reel will do shaky heads, senior, light poppers, and really any thing ended you need on a spinning reel.
customer_reviews.author: Andrewl07

customer_reviews.title: outstanding value
customer_reviews.text: Simply the best value in a fishing reel, there is nothing better under$200. Smooth, and reliable. I am replacing all my Penn reels with these.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality all the way around!
customer_reviews.text: This simply is the best reel for the money hands down. Smooth with zero issues. I own previous president models and was suprised, and appreciative with the addition of the rubber inserts on the spool. I use fireline and have had to pre spool with mono before adding the braid. The mono gripped the spool and kept the braid from spinning on the spool. However with the rubber inserts this is no longer necessary! Thanks Pflueger for adding a feature that serves a purpose. It is the little things like paying attention to the customer's needs that will keep me a customer for years to come!
customer_reviews.author: Bizzness360

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product: Great Value at an Unbeatable Price!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice reel. You can feel the quality of the product just taking it out of the box. The anti-reverse is very tight, and the action is smooth as silk. I only wish it had a faster retrieval.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice and smooth left or right handed, priced right also.
customer_reviews.author: Rabe

customer_reviews.title: The President reel is one of the best values in the industry
customer_reviews.text: I've been an avid fisherman my whole life. The President reel is one of the best values in the industry. It's a tried and true piece of equipment and you can't go wrong with one. I've had mine for almost 2 years now and like it's smooth action, reliability, and price!
customer_reviews.author: A. King

customer_reviews.title: Best reel you can buy for the money!
customer_reviews.text: Best ultra light reel I have ever bought so smooth and the drag works great! Caught a 37 inch northern pike with it on my ultra light rod!
customer_reviews.author: MKlatt59

customer_reviews.title: Best light reel
customer_reviews.text: Had a 35, great for the river or lake but needed a reel for the spring shad run. Bought a 25 and put it on a 6 ft. light rod with 10 lb. braid, this reel has caught a lot of fish and shows no sign of wearing out, you can tell it has good bearings.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best Value in Spinning Reels
customer_reviews.text: The best smooth and reliable reel for the money. I've jigged and hauled hundreds of lake trout up from 200-250 feet with Pflueger President reels.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Cox

customer_reviews.title: great, smooth reel
customer_reviews.text: This is just a terrific reel. I had bought cheaper Pflueger model earlier which was stiff and didn't feel really smooth. Ended up with this guy and it's like reeling in a cloud. Spend the extra $15 and get this guy. You'll be happy you did.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Balikian

customer_reviews.title: Excellent reel so far
customer_reviews.text: Excellent reel so far. Still need to get more use out of it before I would give it 5 stars, but so far I have no complaints.

customer_reviews.title: Nice smooth reel for the money
customer_reviews.text: Nice smooth reel for the money. I have this reel in my 6' medium light one piece Fenwick eagle. I love it!

I got the 1500 size and use it for trout. It has been dunked in the river and bashed around a lot and still works perfectly. Retrieve and line capacity are also great, bale arm always snaps in place.

customer_reviews.title: The reason I bought this is because I hear a ...

customer_reviews.text: Lightweight, dependable, great for any rod. I put this on my ultra light rod and my medium action rods.

customer_reviews.title: 10/10 Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this reel. It is so smooth and reliable. My first spinning reel was a Pflueger my dad bought me in 1976, so I started out with a Pflueger and will be finishing with another Pflueger as I'm pretty sure this is the last reel I will ever need to buy. 10/10 Stars

customer_reviews.text: This is my second President - very responsive and smooth - easily handles the large mouth I use it for.
customer_reviews.author: Navy Dad

customer_reviews.title: Great little reel if you use the right line
customer_reviews.text: Bought the 6925 size. I really like this reel.........BUT........... I bought it to use with 6 lb "superline" (Berkley Nanofil/Ardent Gliss). For whatever reason this reel WILL NOT handle these light braid lines. On the retrieve the line will frequently wrap around the rear skirt of the spool. I have a couple of other reels that do the same thing. My Shimano's and Diawa's never do this. Despite my best efforts I can't figure out why this happens. If anyone knows why PLEASE let me know in the "comments" section. Other than that, this is a really nice little reel. If you use mono line I don't think you'll find a better reel for the money.
customer_reviews.author: R. Davis

customer_reviews.title: Best reel ever!
customer_reviews.text: Best reel ever!!! cast 200+ this Saturday not a snag or twist. I fish every weekend and this is the last reel I need.

product_meta.title: Pflueger President Spinning Reel
product_meta.description: Offering class-leading performance at a great value, the Pflueger President Spinning Fishing Reel delivers the extreme durability and smooth drag that seasoned anglers demand. This fishing reel ensures smooth operation with nine stainless steel ball bearings plus an instant anti-reverse bearing that provides improved crank control. From the aircraft-grade aluminum handle to the graphite body and rotor, the President Spinning Reel is designed for years of use. The graphite construction provides extreme responsiveness without compromising rigidity, creating a highly durable reel that doesn't flex or give out under extreme pressure. You'll also enjoy exceptional pulling power thanks to the reel's multi-disc drag system, which uses stainless steel and oiled felt washers to produce smooth yet forceful drag. A braid-ready aluminum spool, precise-operating 10-bearing system, and a soft-touch grip round out this reliable spinning fishing reel.
feature_bullets: Durable spinning fishing reel ideal for both seasoned anglers and casual hobbyists
10 bearing system with 9 corrosion-resistant stainless steel ball bearings and instant anti-reverse bearing
Aircraft-grade aluminum handle and graphite body and rotor offer extreme durability
Stainless steel and oiled felt drag system delivers smooth, consistent drag pressure
Braid-ready spool allows braid to be tied directly to spool
